ef5fed94-c82f-40c6-8013-bde328d38d8f.description: The "Discovery Tier" is the first stage of re-skilling tracks offered by Learning@Proximus. It demystifies topics covered within these intensive tracks. At the end of this 10+ hour learning path, the earner is able to explain fundamental concepts and keywords related to networking, virtualization, public cloud, wireless communication, automation and programming, data and cyber security. It is the obligated first step within the Proximus Ambassador Re-skilling program.
ef5fed94-c82f-40c6-8013-bde328d38d8f.name: Technology Hatchling, Discovery Tier

badge_template_activities.title: Earner attended the "Discovery Tier", a 10+ hour program providing an overview of essential topics on networking, virtualization, cloud, wireless communication, automation and programming, data, cyber security. This learning track prepares for the test, that validates fundamental knowledge.

Earner passed the "Discovery Tier" Test, a multiple choice test on topics from the "Discovery Tier". Random questions need to be answered on topics regarding networking, virtualization, cloud, wireless and 5G, automation and programming, data and cyber security. Passing score is 60%.

5659eb14-d5ae-4e68-8689-89e3958e74dd.description: The “CXP/UX Discovery Tier” by Learning@Proximus introduces the learner to topics and terminology related to CXP/UX. This badge includes 10 learning hours. This "CXP/UX Hatchling" badge is the first and obligated step towards the intensive CXP/UX track and validates the knowledge on essential CXP/UX concepts. After passing the associated "CXP/UX Discovery Tier Quiz", learners with this badge can submit their candidature towards the Proximus "CXP/UX Ambassador" program.
5659eb14-d5ae-4e68-8689-89e3958e74dd.name: CXP/UX Hatchling, Discovery Tier

badge_template_activities.title: Customer Centricity: online-module providing an introduction to “Customer Centricity” with learning modules of Steve Jobs on Customer Experience with Apple and short testimonials of top managers and CEO’s.

Business value and benefits of CX:  online introduction modules by Kerry Bodine at USI on the “Business Value of Customer Experience” and “Why is customer experience so important” by Mark Fidelman, CEO of Fanatics Media.

"What is Customer Experience": online introduction module that provides an overview of customer experience, defining and explaining of what it takes to deliver great customer experience. Also includes an introduction module covering the “Six laws of Customer Experience” by the Temkin Group.

The added value and benefits of "customer journeys" & "customer journeys" @Proximus. Content: introduction module on “journey maps and why to use them". How can organizations identify “moments of truth” and positively influence the outcome of a customer’s journey? Introduction module to customer journeys and how they are handled at Proximus and the different Business Units (BUs).
Online introduction module that features the "Voice of the Customer" at Proximus.

A one-day (virtual) classroom course "Customer journeys in an easy way". The training provides awareness and understanding regarding “CXP” and “UX” topics, defining terminology and explaining how a company, product, service and project can benefit from having a clear CX strategy. Appended with the strategy video of the Proximus’ “#inspire2022” campaign: “Customer Experience is king, emotion is queen”.

The "CXP/UX Discovery Tier" test, which leads to the "CXP/UX Hatchling" badge, validates essential knowledge of CXP and UX introduction topics. This test is also the first obligated step towards the "CXP/UX Ambassador Program".

ff76dbef-155c-4c43-8e4f-b91d2b8860db.description: The owner of this badge has completed the "Quantum Discovery Track" by Learning@Proximus - an entry level learning track on the essentials of Quantum Mechanics, Quantum Computing and Quantum Key Distribution (QKD). The owner of this badge completed the "Quantum Discovery Quiz" with a pass score of at least 70%.
ff76dbef-155c-4c43-8e4f-b91d2b8860db.name: Quantum Discovery

badge_template_activities.title: The owner of this badge completed the "Quantum Discovery Track" created by Learning@Proximus. This track provides an introduction to Quantum Mechanics, Quantum Computing Concepts and Quantum Key Distribution.
The badge owner completed the "Quantum Discovery Quiz" and obtained a score of at least 70%.

2016654a-a49f-4a99-886f-c3d3d820b913.description: This badge is part of the "Building The Future" program by Proximus. It validates that the participant has successfully completed the "Ambassador Common" Tier of the program. This particular tier does not only require to pass the Cisco CCNA and Microsoft Azure Fundamentals exam, but also to complete other foundation courses and books to expand the T-profile of the learner. This badge is required in order to pass to the next step of the "Ambassador" Tier.
2016654a-a49f-4a99-886f-c3d3d820b913.name: Technology Star, Ambassador Tier

badge_template_activities.title: The participant was allowed into the program after the evaluation of a motivational letter and CV. The participant needs to have passed the "Building The Future: Discovery Tier Test".
The participant attended the Cisco Certified Network Associate training and passed the related Cisco 200-301 CCNA exam, obtaining the Cisco CCNA certification.
The participant attended the "Learning PowerShell 5.0" course by Matt Hester (LinkedIn Learning).
The participant attended the "Learning Linux Command Line" by Scott Simpson (LinkedIn Learning).
The participant was given the task to read the book "cybersecurity for dummies" by Joseph Steinberg.
The participant attended the course "Cybersecurity for IT Professionals" by Malcolm Shore (LinkedIn Learning).
The participant completed the course "Learn Network Analysis Using Wireshark 3" by Mohamad Mahjoub (Packt Publishing).
The participant attended the course "Programming Foundations: Fundamentals" by Annyce Davis (LinkedIn Learning).
The participant attended the course "Programming Foundations: Understanding Databases" by Scott Simpson (Linkedin Learning).
The participant attended the course "Web Programming Foundations" by Morten Rand-Hendriksen (LinkedIn Learning)
The participant attended the course "Programming Foundations: APIs and Web Services" by Kesha Williams (LinkedIn Learning).

The participant attended a Microsoft Essentials Classroom Training on Microsoft Azure Fundamentals in order to prepare for the Microsoft Azure Fundamentals exam (AZ-900). The participant passed the AZ-900 exam and obtained the Microsoft Azure Fundamentals certification (AZ-900).
The participant attended a webinar by the Proximus Learning Guild on "WiFi", called "WiFi for dummies".

The participant attended a course of a half a day on 5G essentials by APIS. The course provides an introduction to the fifth-generation mobile technology and establishes important technical concepts and terms - putting 5G into context by relating it to other current technological trends.
The participant attended the course "Twelve Myths About Data Science" by Ben Sullins (LinkedIn Learning).
The participant attended the course "Data Science Foundations: Fundamentals" by Barton Poulson (LinkedIn Learning).
The participant attended the course "Artificial Intelligence Foundations: Machine Learning" by Doug Rose (LinkedIn Learning).
The participant attended the webinar "How Google is using AI to enhance the digital experience" by Ron Bodkin.

732454c9-0364-4fc3-9d2e-08fd32e31f28.description: This badge is part of the "Building The Future" program by Proximus. It validates that the participant has completed the first three agenda modules within the Building The Future Track on CXP.
732454c9-0364-4fc3-9d2e-08fd32e31f28.name: CXP Star

badge_template_activities.title: Participant attended the classroom training: "Master the terminology and the definitions in the context of CX and customer journeys".
Participant attended the classroom training: "Master the E2E CJ approach and WoW".
Participant completed the chapters on Service Design: mindset, process, toolset and use cases.

ce8ae363-95fd-41a7-850b-89c06ee6f956.description: This badge is part of the Branding Academy, a learning program that gives an insight into the brain of the brand Proximus. This badge validates that the earner attended all Branding Academy sessions and successfully passed the test at the end of the learning program.
ce8ae363-95fd-41a7-850b-89c06ee6f956.name: Branding Academy

badge_template_activities.title: Attended session 1: Why is branding important? Inspirational talk on what's beneath the surface of branding with powerful examples of other brands.
Attended session 2: Brand architecture & brand ambassadorship. Organizational structure of Proximus' portfolio of brands and what is expected from you to help Proximus shine.
Attended session 3: Brand promise ‘Think possible’. Why was our brand promise 'Think possible' created and examples of how 'Think possible' can be brought to life effectively.
Attended session 4: New tone of voice model. The importance of a tone of voice and the PROX model as a reminder for how to communicate at Proximus.
Attended session 5: Visual identity & brand center. Guided tour on our Proximus Brand Center: what's on it, where to find what and who to contact in case of questions.

Attended session 6: How to build a brand-led business and aligned culture? Inspirational talk on the importance of implementing a brand strategy in the heart of the organization so that really everything is aligned to the brand.
Passed the test, a multiple choice test on topics from the different Branding Academy sessions. Passing score is 50%.

128393c5-46f9-4837-9209-147cd3e1a06d.description: This badge documents that the holder has completed the "Ambassador Tier" of the "Building The Future" program, an intensive learning path organized by Proximus. The holder of this badge completed the "public cloud" specialization option and has proven to be an enthusiastic and motivated student with a growth mindset. The holder obtained several industry recognized certifications during this training path, including the Microsoft Azure Administrator certification.
128393c5-46f9-4837-9209-147cd3e1a06d.name: Cloud Track (2020-2021)

badge_template_activities.title: The holder of this badge obtained the "Technology Hatchling" badge within the Proxiums Building The Future program.
The holder of this badge obtained the "Technology Star" badge within the Proximus Building The Future program.
The holder of this badge attended the "Cloud, NFV and SDN in half a day" training by APIS (duration: 0.5days).
The holder of this badge completed the "DevOps Foundations - Your Infrastructure Toolchain" course by Ernest Mueller and James Wickett (duration 3 hours, LinkedIn Learning).
The holder of this badge completed the "DevOps Foundations - Containers" course (duration 1.16 hours, LinkedIn Learning).
The holder of this badge completed the "Learning Cloud Computing: Serverless Computing" course by David Linthicum (duration 1.17 hours, LinkedIn Learning)
The holder of this badge completed the "DevOps Foundations: DevSecOps" course (duration 54minutes, LinkedIn Learning).
The holder of this badge completed the multi-day, Azure Administrator (AZ-104) (virtual) classroom training in order to prepare for the AZ-104 certification.
The holder of this badge successfully completed the AZ-104, Microsoft Azure Administrator exam.

ae2ba8fe-28cc-49f1-9000-cd1ca16d031d.description: The Cyber Security Track by Learning@Proximus is an intensive, 1 year long, learning track were people are trained and re-skilled to prepare for cyber security functions. Earners of this badge have completed different in-house and external training sessions (networking, wireshark, cyber security, essential pentesting, ...) and have obtained industry recognized certifications such as Cisco CCNA, Cisco CCNA Security (IINSv3) and ISC2 Certified Information Security Professional (CISSP).
ae2ba8fe-28cc-49f1-9000-cd1ca16d031d.name: Cyber Security Track (2018-2019).

badge_template_activities.title: Earner obtained the Cisco Certified Network Associate certification.
Earner obtained the Cisco CCNA Cyber Security (IINSv3) certification.
Earner obtained the ISC Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP certification.
Earner attended the Proximus Cyber Security Explored classroom training. This training provides an overview of cyber security concepts, aspects and attacks. Duration: 3 days.
Earner attended the Wireshark PATW classroom training about the Wireshark network analyzer and protocol analysis. Duration: 3 days.
Eaner attended the Proximus Hacking Explained and Intrusion Detection (HEXID) course, providing an overview of classic cyber security attacks, penetration testing techniques, ... Duration: 5 days.
Earner attended the Proximus Linux Power User classroom training. Duration: 4 days.
Earner attended the virtual classroom training by APIS: introduction to Software Defined Networking (SDN), Network Function Virtualization (NFV), ... Duration: 1 day.
Earner participated to the CTF exercise to apply learned security and Wireshark knowledge.
Earner showed active participation to build a learning community to support fellow-students within the track.

skills.name: Cisco Certified Network Associate Cyber Security

046cd0a7-c961-4d30-9d90-4cc34c3739a5.description: This badge documents that the holder has completed the "Ambassador Tier" of the "Building The Future" program, an intensive learning path organized by Proximus. The holder of this badge completed the "data" specialization option and has proven to be an enthusiastic and motivated student with a growth mindset.
046cd0a7-c961-4d30-9d90-4cc34c3739a5.name: Data Track (2020-2021)

The holder of this badge obtained the "Technology Star" badge within the Proximus Building The Future program.
The holder of this badge completed the "Data Science Foundations: Data Engineering" course by Ben Sullins (duration 53 minutes, LinkedIn Learning).

The holder of this badge completed the "Designing an Infographic" course by Nigel French (duration 1,50 hours - LinkedIn Learning).

7c900b6f-cc7a-4c7d-9bec-1f0c42d51342.description: The “Expert Skills Data Engineer” track (2018-2019- by Learning@Proximus is an intensive, 1-year long learning program that trains and re-skills people to start data engineer jobs. Holders of this badge completed 9 training sessions, 2 digital training collections and passed 3 exams.
7c900b6f-cc7a-4c7d-9bec-1f0c42d51342.name: Data Engineer Track (2018-2019)

badge_template_activities.title: Earner (“student”) attended “The Master Labs” Introduction to Data Science classroom training. This training offers a quick overview of the domain 'Data Science' and the role of a data scientist within this domain. Duration: 0,5 day.

Earner attended “The Master Labs”  Understanding the question classroom training. This training provides the skills necessary to understand the question that a data scientist is asked. Duration: 2 days.

Earner attended “The Master Labs” Data Gathering classroom training. This training answers questions like: Where can we find that data? How can we access it? Are we free to use it commercially? Duration: 1 day.

Earner attended “The Master Labs” Data Privacy classroom training. Throughout this training, the history of the privacy movement is explained, and includes a discussion of the General Data Protection Regulation (“GDPR”) that will enter into force in May 2018 to protect the privacy of European citizens. Duration: 1 day.
Earner completed “The Master Labs” Big Data Basics digital training collection. The training provides a fundamental knowledge of big data. Duration: 1 day.
Earner completed “The Master Labs” Big Data classroom training. The training introduces the complexities of the big data world and the way to deal with them. Duration: 2 days.

Earner completed “The Master Labs”  Databases classroom training. The training walks through the evolution from metal filing cabinets to hierarchical and network databases, relational databases, and SQL, all the way to today's NoSQL stores. Duration: 2 days.

Earner completed “The Master Labs”  Information modelling classroom training. The training teaches how to use the Entity Relationship Model to structure your reasoning when it comes to thinking about data. An Entity Relationship Diagram can be used to understand the business domain, to clarify business terminology and to connect these business concepts to database structures. Duration: 5 days.

Earner completed “The Master Labs” Normalization classroom training. Normalization is the set of rules that need to be respected to create a good relational database. It helps reduce data redundancy and improves data integrity. Duration: 2 days.
Earner completed “The Master Labs” the SQL classroom training. The training teaches the most important SQL statements and how to write SQL queries. Duration: 3 days.
Earner passed  “The Master Labs” Find & Store the data exam (data science fundamentals, data gathering, data privacy, big data, databases, information modelling, normalization, SQL)

Earner completed “The Master Labs” Preprocessing data classroom training. The training teaches how to move from a messy dataset to a clean dataset that is ready for analysis: cleaning, integrating, transforming, reducing and discretizing raw data. Duration: 2 days.

Earner completed “The Master Labs” Business Intelligence classroom training. The training discusses why BI is valuable, who you need on your team, where to start and which pitfalls to avoid. The training talks about data warehousing and dimensional modeling and why those things are important. Duration: 2 days.
Earner completed “The Master Labs” Introduction to statistics classroom training. The training discusses the common pitfalls in statistics and how to avoid them. Duration: 2 days.

Earner completed “The Master Labs” Introduction to analytics classroom training. The training discusses a range of business domains where analytics can be applied, including marketing optimization and people analytics. The training explains the difference between descriptive, diagnostic, predictive and prescriptive analytics. Duration: 1 day.

Earner completed “The Master Labs” Data visualization classroom training. The training tackles both theory and practice for data visualization and enhancements thereof. The final objective is to find the right visual for your message. Duration: 2 days.
Earner completed “The Master Labs” Teradata Basics digital training collection. The training provides a fundamental knowledge of Teradata. Duration: 1 day.

Earner completed “The Master Labs”  A Data Science Case from A-Z classroom training. In the training the students go through the process of a data science project at a rapid pace. In doing so, we take the perspective of a data scientist. Duration: 2 days.
Earner passed “The Master Labs” Clean & Explore the data exam (preprocessing data, BI, statistics fundamentals, analytics fundamentals, data visualization)

Earner completed “The Master Labs”  Master data management classroom training. The training introduces the core concepts in Master Data Management and offers specific guidance on how to prevent issues. Duration: 1 day.

Earner completed “The Master Labs”  NoSQL databases classroom training. The training discusses the rise of NoSQL, Not Only SQL, and the four main types of NoSQL-databases: key-value stores, document stores, column-oriented stores, and graph stores. Duration: 2 days.

Earner completed “The Master Labs” Data mining classroom training. The training discusses the inner workings of 10 of the most often used data mining algorithms and show you exactly what is happening under the hood. Duration: 2 days.

Earner completed “The Master Labs”  Data Science – Completing Case classroom training. Data scientists to practice their skills and to apply advanced techniques in a more complex, case. Based on knowledge and experience, they have to elaborate a complete analysis using the techniques discussed so far: understand the question, find the data, store the data, clean the data, explore the data, analyze the data in depth, visualize the results and tell the story. Duration: 3 days
Earner completed “The Master Labs” Power Pivot & Power BI classroom training. The training teaches how to use Power BI to create and publish reports. Duration: 2 days.
Earner completed “The Master Labs” Microstrategy Analyst classroom training. The training teaches how to use Microstrategy to create and publish reports. Duration: 1 day.
Earner passed “The Master Labs” Data Science exam (all topics).

85a11c27-8d62-47ee-9a2d-998513ca4fa9.description: This badge is an appreciation for your active participation and contribution to our cyber security guild and community. It recognizes guild members who contribute to the success and vitality of the community and who are passionate about helping their peers with their knowledge and skills.
85a11c27-8d62-47ee-9a2d-998513ca4fa9.name: Proximus Cyber Security Guild: Contributor

badge_template_activities.title: The badge owner is or has been a member of the Proximus Cyber Security Guild.
To earn this badge, a Proximus Cyber Security guild member must present or contribute to at least one presentation or workshop within the guild.

f9e504af-77a5-4c89-9a93-dfdf2f23b763.description: This badge documents that the holder has completed the "Ambassador Tier" of the "Building The Future" program, an intensive learning path organized by Proximus. The holder of this badge completed the "cyber security" specialization option and has proven to be an enthusiastic and motivated student with a growth mindset. The holder obtained several industry recognized certifications during this training path, including the ISC2 CISSP (Associate) certification.
f9e504af-77a5-4c89-9a93-dfdf2f23b763.name: Cyber Security Track (2020-2021)

badge_template_activities.title: The holder of this badge obtained the "Technology Hatchling" badge within the Proximus Building The Future program.
The holder of this badge obtained the "Technology Star" badge within the Proximus Building The Future program.
The holder of this badge attended the multi-day ISC2 CISSP (Certified Information Systems Security Professional) boot camp.
The holder of this badge prepared for, and passed the ISC2 CISSP (Certified Information Systems Security Professional) (Associate) certification.

81d5b275-90ba-4e81-af33-4a0a0b1fbf55.description: This badge documents that the holder has completed the "Ambassador Tier" of the "Building The Future" program, an intensive learning path organized by Proximus. The holder of this badge completed the "network" specialization option and has proven to be an enthusiastic and motivated student with a growth mindset. The holder obtained several industry recognized certifications during this training path, including the Cisco Certified DevNet Associate certification.
81d5b275-90ba-4e81-af33-4a0a0b1fbf55.name: Network Track (2020-2021)

badge_template_activities.title: Attended and completed the Cisco DevNet Associate course preparing for the Cisco 200-901 DEVASC exam.
The holder of this badge passed the Cisco Certified DevNet Associate exam and obtained a valid 200-901 DEVASC certification.
The holder of this badge completed the 12 hour APIS course on "SND, Cloud & NFV".
The holder of this badge completed the 18 hours APIS course on "Network Function Virtualization - Architecture and Principles".
The holder of this badge completed the 4 hour DataCamp course: "introduction to Python".
